attributes.action: Use recognised dictionary definitions to form statistics and policies
attributes.additional_details:
The UK government are currently boasting about record employment in the UK
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-46958560

Government definition of employment; https://www.ons.gov.uk/employmentandlabourmarket/peopleinwork/employmentandemployeetypes/methodologies/aguidetolabourmarketstatistics?fbclid=IwAR0OgYL10S78a4YH5AAbUtA9a_ToFl8eLYqcA45rC6xpiocSFW6MexEd9Ls#employment

Cambridge Dictionary definition of employment;
https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/employment
attributes.background: In UK politics it is regular practice to use adjusted definitions that are often contrary to widely accepted dictionary definitions as a way of manipulating data and misleading the public. We need and deserve transparency.
